title: FAKE Alert: India’s Telecom Department is NOT giving free internet to all mobile users | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A message is being circulated on social media along with a website link claiming that the Department of Telecommunications (DOT) is providing free internet to all the mobile users till May 3, 2020.

Link to the above post.

NewsMobile fact-checked the above post and found it to be false.

We checked the website and found that to avail this “offer”, one needs to provide one’s contact details and also the name of the service provider. We also noted that the spelling of ‘operator’ was wrong.

Moreover, the provided website link is different from the actual website of the Department of Communication.

The press Information Bureau (PIB) also clarified that the viral message is false.

It is clear beyond doubt that no such offer has been made by the DoT and that the post being circulated is FAKE.
